ad_text: Mercer Health Sponsored Mercer Health has immediate openings for full-time and part-time nurses in our Inpatient Services, Childbirth Center, and Mercer Health Medical Group offices. Mercer Health’s comprehensive benefits package includes generous paid time off, health, dental and vision coverage, participation in the Ohio Public Employees Retirement Plan, continuing education opportunities, tuition assistance and more! Start your career at Mercer Health where you will make a difference every day in the lives of your friends, family and neighbors. MERCER-HEALTH.COM Join Our Team! We would like to hear from qualified, highly-motivated individuals who share the Mission of Mercer Health to positively steer our community’s health. Your decision to join the Mercer Health team is one that will be rewarded on a daily basis as you make life better for patients and their families. Apply now
